name: Mashed Potatoes and Carrots With Ricotta
keywords: carrot, potato, ricotta, low-fat, side dish
recipeIngredient: 3/4 pound boiling potatoes, peeled and cut into two-inch cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Place potatoes and carrots in pot and cover with water; cover and bring to boil. Reduce heat and cook until vegetables are tender, about 12 to 15 minutes. Remove from heat and drain.
Mash potatoes and carrots and combine with cumin, salt (optional), ricotta and sauteed onion, mixing well.
